page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: Sunday 31st. March. I woke up at 9 O'clock, but it was really 10 O'clock because we put the clock forward.I had my breakfast of Weetabix and toast. I went upstairs to get dressed,brushed my teeth and went out to garden. I got out my rabbit and he ran round our garden. I went to plant seeds. At 1.10 I went and helped Mum make the dinner. I set the table and we sat down to eat. We had beef,roast and mashed potatoes, carrots, cabbage, yorkshire} pudding, and gravy followed by Lemon Bakewell. Then I went to Emma's house, where we talked played games which were Spellbound and Magic,and listened to WHAM! When I got home I watched a video. At 7.30 I returned the video. I then watched television, but I was tired so I went to bed.{
